main_definition: Past refers to the time that has gone by, or things that happened before the present moment.

meanings_and_examples.example: I have a lot of memories from my past when I was younger.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Previous history or events that occurred before now
meanings_and_examples.example: The company has had some setbacks in its past, but it's working on improvements.
I used to work at a different job in the city center before moving here.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Something that is outdated or obsolete
meanings_and_examples.example: These old phones are from my past, and I prefer using modern ones now.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The section of a written work preceding the current part
meanings_and_examples.example: In this book, we will focus on Chapter 3 before moving to Chapter 4, which is in the present context.
